text: P1 asked P2 how often they drink and P2 said "couple times a week." P1 then asked P2 how much they can drink and P2 said "at least 10 drinks." P1 replied that they only drink when they go out and have 2 beers, to which P2 said "you're a light weight." P2 also mentioned that they usually drink all night and have a special deal at Dante's on Mondays where they can get $5 pitchers for $10. P1 agreed that this was a good deal. P2 then suggested going to the Ram Bar and Grill the next night for a special on pitchers and P1 agreed.
